casebody.data:
NOVELL, INC., petitioner,
v.
MICROSOFT CORPORATION. No. 13-1042. Supreme Court of the United States April 28, 2014.

Case below, 731 F.3d 1064.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.

THE CHIEF JUSTICE took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
